# Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) for Consultant Services: Repair of Jetty NC, CFB Halifax

## [Relevant technical information omitted for brevity]

## Description of Project and Services

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is calling for Abbreviated Proposals from engineering consulting firms to provide the following professional services:

* Preparation of construction requirements and concept
* Site measurements
* Design development
* Construction documents
* Assistance during the tender call and construction phases

for the repair of the Jetty NC at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

The services are to be provided by a team including:

| Position | Unit of Measure |
| --- | --- |
| Project Manager | Hourly |
| Senior Structural Marine Engineer | Hourly |
| Senior Civil Engineer | Hourly |
| ... | ... |

## How to Participate

Firms interested in providing these services are invited to submit Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System. The proposal submission deadline is June 8, 2023, at 14:00 ET.

## Important Dates

* Site visit: March 14, 2023, 10:00 AM (local time), Rainbow Gate entrance, 5088 Provo Wallis Street, Dockyard, CFB Halifax, NS, B3K 5X5.
* Registration for site visit closed March 11, 2023, 10:00 AM (local time).

## Contracting Information

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) will provide the following information to the successful proponent:

### Contract Terms:
* Term of contract: April 9, 2024 - April 9, 2024.
* Security Requirements: Identified in the RFAP documents.
* Upset Fee: Maximum per GC 5.2.1.2.1.

### Bidding Documents
The RFAP document and bidding documents are available on the MERX website at [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com).
